question_text: What makes a spectrum analyzer more effective than a Wi-Fi analyzer when troubleshooting unexplained wireless issues?
answer_options: It displays signal strength for all frequencies in the band, not just Wi-Fi signals
It maps IP traffic to specific users
correct_answer: It displays signal strength for all frequencies in the band, not just Wi-Fi signals
explanation: Spectrum analyzers detect all radio activity in the band, making them ideal for identifying interference from non-802.11 sources.
